description:
Seek out the ebbs and flows of the trail. Efficient for climbing and capable for descents, this trail bike digs it all. Shimano Deore groupset is a solid performer, with powerful pedaling and no-nonsense gear changes. An extra-special ingredient in this rig is the RockShox 35 Silver R, a durable, capable fork for taking drops and descents confidently. 29er wheels have the rolling momentum to charge over rock gardens and let it rip when the way opens up.

  • SmartForm C1 alloy frame, with a slack headtube angle and versatile trail geometry
  • RockShox 35 Silver suspension fork with 140mm of progressive coil travel
  • RockShox Deluxe select uses the Highly tunable DebonAir™ spring and has with 130mm of travel
  • 1x11 drive train pairs a 30T chain ring with an 11-51T cassette
  • Shimano Deore 5100 drivetrain
  • Tektro M275 hydraulic disc brakes have adjustable reach and 180mm rotors front and back
  • TranzX dropper post provides a stable pedaling platform when needed and tucks out of the way when it’s time to drop-in
  • Maxxis Ardent tires are fast rolling, use the EXO casing, and are tubeless ready
  • Internal cable routing keeps things safe and clean
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Habit 5 Bicycle - Unisex
